name: Adello Group
overview:
Adello owns and operates AdCTRL, a real time analytics platform for mobile advertising.

AdCTRL is built for large scale and world wide mobile advertising delivery combined with a high performing analytics system to allow for better targeting of advertising in real time. AdCTRL analytics are set up to deal with a cookie free environment and provide multidimensional targeting without interference with customer data protection issues.

Adello is based in Switzerland with offices throughout Europe and the ability to deliver campaigns globally. Adello is serving both multinational and local advertisers and publishers.
